author: Lyle S
comment: This app is absolutely great and you are a genious, I have given you 4 stars, if you update it with more farts I will go out of my way to give you 5 stars, you could even offer in app purchases for like 99 cents, extra fart packages, burp packages, the "whistle at girls" package, queef package. The posibilities are ENDLESS! Thank you, thank you so much
title: Add more farts!

author: Joe Langschultz
comment: Would be much better if it was louder. I have an HTC One which has good volume but this is pretty quiet on loudest setting compared to any other app I use with sound.

reply.author: Curtis Martin
reply.content: That's very strange. I wonder if it might have something to do with the sound channel being used. I don't have a One to test with, but I could send you some test builds to try out and see if it fixes the problem if you like. Shoot me a support email and I'll take a crack at it.

title: Ok

author: Christopher Pierick
comment: Not only is this great to use on people, my pets go crazy when I use it to mess with them!
title: Perfect!

author: David Teichman
comment: Hands down the best fart app out there.
title: Waft is awesome!

author: Tom Ritucci
comment: If you have Android Wear you need this app hahaha it's hilarious!
title: Too Funny!

author: Francesco Sunseri
comment: 21st century whoopee cushion... Amazing. Especially when I strapped the phone to my 8 month old and had everybody amazed that such a huge fact came from a baby... Please do yourself a favor and buy this.
title: Simply the best

author: Patrick Jackson
comment: Perfect for pranks.  Works as advertised and easy to use.  Can't wait to see what updates bring.
title: Hilarious!!

author: chris smith
comment: This app did not work on my Samsung Gear live watch. Even after manually syncing the apps it never showed in the list of apps or commands.
title: Did not work
